snippet: In the Metro Atlantic Athletic Conference semifinals, Fairfield, ranked fourth in the conference, beat No. 1 Iona, to move into the title game against Loyola (Md.), which beat Siena.
abstract: Fairfield University defeats Iona College, 85-75, in semifinals of men's Metro Atlantic Conference basketball tournament; sets up final against Loyola University of Maryland, which beat Siena, 70-60.
lead_paragraph: In the Metro Atlantic Athletic Conference semifinals, Fairfield, ranked fourth in the conference, beat No. 1 Iona, to move into the title game against Loyola (Md.), which beat Siena.

headline.seo: Fairfield Upsets Iona to Gain MAAC Basketball Final
headline.main: Fairfield Upsets Iona to Reach MAAC Final
headline.print_headline: Fairfield Upsets Iona To Reach MAAC Final
